mapper.insert: insert into counsel_booking (student_no, counsel_typeno, counsel_request_content, booking_dt, booking_time, staff_no) values (#{student_no}, #{counsel_typeno}, #{counsel_request_content}, #{booking_dt}, #{booking_time}, #{staff_no})
mapper.select: select cd_nm from code where cate = '5000' and cd = #{booking_time};
mapper.insert: insert into counsel_record (student_no, booking_no, counsel_content, counsel_record_dt) values (#{student_no}, #{booking_no}, #{counsel_content}, sysdate())
mapper.update: update counsel_record set counsel_content = #{counsel_content}, counsel_record_dt = sysdate() where booking_no = #{booking_no}
